database.name: TestAndDemo4 regression test: SIARD, EXT DDV, redaction

screen.title: Employees
screen.subtitle: The table was created from a SIARD package and populated from a EXT DDV package; use of redaction.
screen.query: SELECT "HR employees"."Id" AS "ID", "HR employees"."Employee Name" AS "Name", "HR employees"."date Hired /hq" AS "Hired" FROM "HR members"."HR employees"
